item.title: Chapter 1 - Linear Models
item.description: Linear Regression Problem: Assume $$ y_{n \times 1} = X_{n \times p} \ \beta_{p \times 1} + \varepsilon_{n \times 1}, $$ and error $\varepsilon$ is mean zero. We want to Logistic Regression Other Generalized Linear Models (incl. Probit Regression)
